title: Yellow Hallways N Stuff

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- Remove someone's imagination at night, causing them to lose their first ability. It still resolves if they used it tonight.
- Be yellow during the day, causing yourself to gain Powerful defense and roleblock, redirect, and detection immunity the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only be yellow three times.
- If you would remove an ability of someone who doesn't have an ability, you attack them instead.
- If you would attack someone who would survive your attack, you roleblock them instead.
- If you would roleblock someone who would be immune or who it would have no effect on, you permanently remove them from the game instead.
- If you would permanently remove someone from the game who that would have no effect on, you cope, seethe, and mald instead.

desc:
Post 2685
*I don't know much about the Backrooms, so I can't say I've got any ideas for roles to add to that*
